thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Israeli Police Name Netanyahu’s Former Aides in New Investigation

author: Rory Jones
title: Israeli Police Name Netanyahu’s Former Aides in New Investigation
text:
TEL AVIV—Israeli police Tuesday named two close confidants of Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu they had arrested on allegations of influence peddling on behalf of the Israeli leader, who already faces the prospect of an indictment for corruption and the unraveling of his ruling coalition.

Police said the leader’s former spokesman Nir Hefetz, and Shlomo Filber, the ex-head of the communications ministry under Mr. Netanyahu, were arrested on Sunday on suspicion they had organized positive media coverage for the leader and his...
